policies.title: Privacy Policies
policies.subtitle: Your Data, Your Control
policies.p1: This application is designed with your privacy and security as a top priority. We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data, including your API keys.
policies.p2: Your Binance API keys are stored exclusively in your browser's local environment. They are never sent to any server, including ours. This means only you have access to them, directly from your own machine. The keys are used solely for making direct, read-only requests to the Binance API from your browser to fetch market data.
policies.p3: All trading simulation data, such as your virtual balance and holdings, is also stored locally in your browser. Clearing your browser's storage will reset the simulation.
